about_the_game:
From narrow corridors filled with vampires and werewolves to shadowy ramparts infested by swooping gargoyle bats, Crimson Towers are a perilous leg of your adventurer's journey. Crimson Towers Battlepack is a pint-sized addition to the wealth of free and paid material Michael Rookard has shared over the years - and it does not disappoint.

With 8 enemies and 3 new battlebacks, Crimson Towers Battlepack is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG Maker Resources.

Features:
  • 5 unique enemies, with variations for a total of 8 enemy graphics.
  • 3 matching thematic battle backgrounds.
  • Expertly painted and designed by Michael Rookard.
  • Imaginative and inspired by both modern fantasy and classic monster archetypes.
  • Formatted for use in RPG Maker MV / MZ.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Crimson Towers Battlepack" and "RPG Maker MV - Crimson Towers Battlepack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
